pageContext.claim: “Foxconn has already contracted 27 local Wisconsin companies to begin construction of the main facility. As big as this is, this is just a toy compared to the main facility. And I'm pleased to report that Foxconn intends to build 100 percent of the factory with beautiful American concrete and beautiful American steel, made right here. So important.”
pageContext.analysis: It can not be verified that the plant will be built with American concrete and steel.
